Help
What is NoSave?
\n NoSave is a small tool use to message any WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business user without saving his/her into your phone-book. \n\n
This was the problem which I was facing lots of time in my day, So I thought why not to build a solution for this problem. There are some situations when you need to communicate with a new person for some temporary need, And when that work is done you don,t need that contact anymore. But a lot of time when we save that contact, after the work is done normally we don,t delete it and it stays there for no need. So with this app, You can save some time in saving and managing your contacts. \n\n
Hope it will help you in some way \n\n
Your feedback is valuable:
